effect:
Swarm increases the power of Bug-type moves by 50% (1.5×) when the ability-bearer's HP falls below a third of its maximum (known in-game as in a pinch).
If a Pokémon with Swarm is the leading party Pokémon, wild Pokémon are twice as likely to appear.
description: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
